summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4815 for the improvement of 42nd Avenue South from Graham Street to Holly Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by the construction of watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 55571, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll , establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
